statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_shopping;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM virtual_reality_shopping WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, category, price, supplier_id FROM virtual_reality_shopping WHERE price < 500;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM virtual_reality_shopping WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price, supplier_id FROM virtual_reality_shopping ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_shopping WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM virtual_reality_shopping WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity FROM virtual_reality_shopping WHERE supplier_id = 3 ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM virtual_reality_shopping WHERE category = 'Gaming' AND quantity >= 10 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_id FROM virtual_reality_shopping WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY supplier_id ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'sale'
SELECT transaction_id, item_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT item_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM inventory JOIN transactions ON inventory.item_id = transactions.item_id WHERE transaction_type = 'sale' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%' AND quantity < 10;

SELECT inventory.item_name, SUM(transactions.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory JOIN transactions ON inventory.item_id = transactions.item_id GROUP BY inventory.item_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price < 50;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND price < 100.00;

SELECT t.transaction_id, c.customer_name, i.item_name, t.quantity, t.total_amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN inventory i ON t.item_id = i.item_id WHERE t.total_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY t.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_price FROM inventory WHERE item_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT DISTINCT item_category FROM inventory;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM inventory WHERE item_price > 100 ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM inventory WHERE id = 5
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY quantity ASC, item_name ASC;

SELECT users.username, inventory.item_name, shopping_cart.quantity FROM users INNER JOIN shopping_cart ON users.id = shopping_cart.user_id INNER JOIN inventory ON shopping_cart.item_id = inventory.id WHERE users.username = 'john.doe';
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_items, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM inventory;

SELECT users.username, items.item_name, transactions.total_amount, transactions.transaction_date FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.id = transactions.user_id JOIN inventory items ON transactions.item_id = items.id WHERE users.id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
